title: Utah
prompt: A weathered pickup truck parked on a quiet county road cutting through high desert scrubland at golden hour, with distant mountains on the horizon and a small rural clinic or hospital visible as a modest structure in the far middle distance. The composition emphasizes vast empty space and geographic isolationâ€”wide landscape showing how much land separates sparse communities from healthcare. Warm, dusty light with long shadows across the asphalt, capturing the texture of rural infrastructure and the quiet weight of distance that defines healthcare delivery in frontier Utah.
